segments.text: Gross ! What are you doing to yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Chill ! I'm just curling my eyelashes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It looks like some kind of primitive form of torture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're such a wimp ! You're afraid of an eyelash curler .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you might pinch your eyelid ! Or lose an eyeball !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It just makes my eyelashes curl upwards .
segments.speaker: S2
